name: Froggy Focus
description:
Play as Froggy and eat all the flies you can!

...but beware, hungry lizards stand in your way.

Luckily, these lizards only move when you're looking at them! 

Made for Snappy Gurus Game Off Summer 2022

GAME JAM THEME: "Ignorance is Bliss"

WASD to turn, SPACE to hop forwards

Can you find both the hidden easter eggs?

ALL assets (apart from the font) made by me!
